EXIT Recents Requests Delete Post Phone Number/General Area About Dementia and Tips AboutActivity Dementia is a group of conditions that collectively affect a personâ€™s memory and their ability to make decisions. There are over 50 million people who suffer from dementia and there are over 10 million new cases every year. How can I help? While dementia is not a condition that can be completely cured, there are steps people can take to help: - Keep their safety in mind - Have a positive attitude around them - Avoid overly stressing them out - Communicate - Be supportive
